titleStmt.title: Irelands fidelity to the Parliament of England. In answer to a paper, intituled, The humble petition of the officers and soldiers in the fort of Duncannon.

notesStmt.note: In reply to: The humble petition of the officers and soldiers in the fort of Duncannon.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Feb. 8. 1659"; the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
